title: Tiger Face

description:
A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a tiger looking straight ahead. Generally depicted in yellowish-orange with black stripes on its forehead and cheeks, a white muzzle, and neutral expression.

Often used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied üêÖ Tiger.

Available as an Apple Animoji.
apple_vendor_description: The tiger face emoji on Apple devices features a striking and powerful countenance, rendered with meticulous detail. Its vibrant orange fur, bold black stripes, and piercing eyes are brought to life with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, giving it a sense of ferocity and majesty. The soft rounded edges on its ears and snout maintain a friendly yet formidable presence, commonly used to convey bravery, strength, or a playful, energetic spirit.
